metadata.title: CVE-2017-16826 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The coff_slurp_line_table function in coffcode.h in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils2.29.1, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalidmemory access and application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted PE file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
